ip: . This the story of kingdom of David: of first, there sikandin migmandu of Huda there to south of igsile, (Chapter 1–4) and nataman diyad e of intiru nation, lagkes Israel there to north of igsile (Chapter 5–24). Naay-ayaran of egguhud this story concerning ke immenu of David of pegpakig-ehet of enemies din there to seled of nation and there to other nations so that egmaluag the kingdom din and so that egmaresen the kingdom din. Impahunsiling David one person large the faith and respecting of God, and egkateu eg-angey of love of people din. But minsan pad due, mabulut also sikandin and andam eggimu of makaalat-halat sale so that egkaangken din the kandin mismu igkeupii and eg-im-imanen. But of impapitew e of Master God there kandin the sale din by means of prophet of Master God Natan, mig-inniyuhan din e the sins din and accepted/received din the impeuyan of God punishment so that igpaneem-neem kandin.

meta.ip: The living and keupianan neyimu of David, very nakapamula there to heart and suman-suman of me Hebrews. Therefore of time miggingumaan of mangune-kune difficulty the nation, and of time egkeupian e again them of lein King, iyan dan igkeupii the person anak of David, ke sikanta pa, descendants of David egpekeiling ded iya kandin.

io1: The kingdom of David there to Huda
The kingdom of David of intiru Israel

io2: b. The peg-ahew of David of asawa of Uriyas
c. The kasamuk and the difficulty
